description.value:
Oreads are humanoids whose bloodline is infused with power from the Plane of Earth, such as from a shaitan. Oreads usually have skin of a dark neutral tone, and some have features that appear to be made of stone, crystal, or packed earth. Oreads are generally calm to the point of stoicism.

Ability Adjustments +2 Str, +2 Wis, –2 Cha
Hit Points 6

Size and Type

Oreads are Medium outsiders with the native subtype.

@Compendium[sfrpg.racial-features.ursgilW1UIpEd3vc]{Acid Resistance}

Oreads have acid resistance 5.

@Compendium[sfrpg.racial-features.HhrIJeHTxSGVX9mV]{Darkvision}

Oreads have darkvision with a range of 60 feet.

@Compendium[sfrpg.racial-features.12EB1YcNhJnwzIGh]{Earth Affinity}

Whenever an oread deals acid damage (including with spells such as energy ray), the oread can change it to bludgeoning damage instead. This doesn’t change anything else about the effect dealing the damage.

@Compendium[sfrpg.racial-features.9qOkQQ3jDPmNl78N]{Spell-Like Ability}

An oread can use @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.xNs98gJ8XLhmVyR3]{Energy Ray} as a spell-like ability at will but can deal only acid damage with the ray. The oread’s caster level is equal to their level.
